txt.en: Wódscrafen is full of dead who woke to walk the cold passages of the cave, stirred by some great evil there.
'Those draug needed to be put back to rest. Many warriors here are superstitious of the dead and the omen of their walking among the living. Your deeds will put their hearts at ease, [placeholder].'
Wódscrafen is full of dead who woke to walk the cold passages of the cave, stirred by some great evil there.
Draug can be found in Wódscrafen in the southern Wold, north of Twickenburg.\n\nYou should defeat many draug in Wódscrafen.
The frightened soldier is outside of Wódscrafen.\n\nYou should return to the frightened soldier now that you have defeated many of the terrifying draugar in Wódscrafen.
